images.prompt: A spectral figure, woven from fading recollections and dust motes, drifts through a desolate, otherworldly chamber bathed in the pallid glow of an unseen source, her form rendered in the fractured elegance of charcoal—a haunting portrait mirroring in a shattered, glitching plane that isn’t quite there, the ivory of her ephemeral gown contrasting against the cold, concrete texture of the architecture, observed from a subtly trailing perspective as if witnessing a ghost’s final unraveling, evoking a sorrowful beauty steeped in alien desolation and the fragile impermanence of memory—realistic portrait, digital artwork, highly detailed CGI, volumetric lighting, intricate surface details, photorealistic skin texture, cinematic composition, 8k resolution, octane render, atmospheric perspective, subtle chromatic aberration, photobashing elements, concept art, artstation, trending, award-winning, hyperrealism, delicate line work, subtle noise, depth of field, soft focus on background elements, emphasis on emotional expression, melancholic mood, ethereal quality, dramatic shadows, cool undertones.
